channel.title: Linking my server to my website?
channel.description:
I want my server to run off of my web hosting server, for instance, say my domain was www.example.com
I want the people to type www.example.com to go to my server, and i want my server running on my web host so its not laggy,
Can anyone please explain how this can be done, or give me a link to a topic? It would be gratefully appreciated. All thanks, your truely, Halo4Ever~

item.title: Linking my server to my website?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Halo4Ever:

And how would I get a dedicated server? Can someone supply me to a link for one that would be good?[/quote][quote=“mrrules, post:10, topic:157400”]Were did you get dedicated server from?

You have to pay like $50-100 or even more each month.
It’s not free, I think you guys think it is.

Stanyer:

you can’t host it on your webhost.

I’m sure if you did many modifications and such you can manage to do it, would mess up your bandwidth anyways, don’t think about trying it.

Dedi & VPS: http://www.rackforce.com/index.php?kac&camp=googlededicated&gclid=CMyd-6-eyY8CFQdZMAodizqvxg
Vps are a bit cheaper, however Dedi would be better.

Read full topic

item.title: Linking my server to my website?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Just host the server off your computer and make a webclient and host it off freewebs or 110mb or whatever… Then edit the client so it only connects to your IP (No-ip or hamachi).

item.title: Linking my server to my website?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

Ah just re-read it, i was half right ikiliki was half right dw

So yeah, there is a way to link your URL to the server but you can’t host it on your webhost.

You need a VPS/Dedicated Server.

item.title: Linking my server to my website?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

Ikiliki what i think he’s trying to say is how do you redirect a URL for example “omg.com” to an ip (Like you do with a no-ip) so that when you put “omg.com” as the server ip, it goes to your ip address and they can play your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Linking my server to my website?

item.title: Linking my server to my website?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Not possible to run a private server on a >website< host, I’m sure you can make some modifications and get it to work but that would be difficult and not sure if your host would like it.
If you want them to use ur domain I think the domain has to be on No-IP, I think.
Otherwise you’ll need to pay for a dedicated host.

Read full topic
